Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ServerHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ServerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkHandler
public class ServerHandler extends Object implements NetworkHandler
A server handler which manages the communication the server

  • Method Details

    • initConnection

      public void initConnection(String serverIp, String serverPort)
      Establishes the socket between this server handler and the server, at the specified serverIP on the specified Port, then instantiates a new ACKControl and begin to listen for any message that could arrive
      Parameters:
      serverIp - the ip address of the server
      serverPort - the port's number of the server

    • listen

      public void listen()
      While the connection is present it listens for any message that could arrive and, based on the message's type, it performs different actions

    • connectionAlive

      public boolean connectionAlive()
      Returns true if the connection is still alive
      Specified by:
      connectionAlive in interface NetworkHandler
      Returns:
      true if the connection is still alive

      public void setView(View view)
      Sets the specified view
      Parameters:
      view - the view to set

    • endConnection

      public void endConnection()
      Ends the connection with the server

      Sends the given message

      Parameters:

    • cloudChosenRequest

      public void cloudChosenRequest(int cloudPosition)
      Sends to the server the request to claim a specif cloud
      Parameters:
      cloudPosition - the number of the cloud to claim

    • moveMotherNatureRequest

      public void moveMotherNatureRequest(int endPosition)
      Sends to the server the request to move Mother Nature to the specified position
      Parameters:
      endPosition - the position of the island where Mother Nature will be at the end of this action, if valid

    • moveStudentToIslandRequest

      public void moveStudentToIslandRequest(int islandPosition, PawnColor color)
      Sends to the server the request to move the specified student to the specified island
      Parameters:
      islandPosition - the position of the island
      color - the color of the student to move

    • moveToDiningRoomRequest

      public void moveToDiningRoomRequest(PawnColor color)
      Sends to the server the request to move the specified student to the dining room of the player
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to move

    • useAssistantRequest

      public void useAssistantRequest(int weight)
      Sends to the server the request to use the Assistant card of the specified weight
      Parameters:
      weight - the weight of the assistant card

    • useCharacterRequest

      public void useCharacterRequest(int characterPosition)
      Sends to the server the request to use the Character card at the specified position. It's used to play this of this Character: MAGIC_DELIVERY_MAN, CENTAUR, KNIGHT, FARMER
      Parameters:
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play

    • useCharacterRequest

      public void useCharacterRequest(int islandPosition, int characterPosition)
      Sends to the server the request to use the Character card at the specified position. It's used to play this of this Character: HERALD, GRANDMOTHER_HERBS
      Parameters:
      islandPosition - the position of the island where the card will activate its effect
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play

    • useCharacterRequest

      public void useCharacterRequest(int islandPosition, PawnColor color, int characterPosition)
      Sends to the server the request to use the Character card at the specified position. It's used to play this of this Character: MONK
      Parameters:
      islandPosition - the position of the island where the card will activate its effect
      color - the color of the student to move
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play

    • useCharacterRequest

      public void useCharacterRequest(PawnColor color, int characterPosition)
      Sends to the server the request to use the Character card at the specified position. It's used to play this of this Character: SPOILED_PRINCESS, THIEF, MUSHROOM_HUNTER
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the student to move
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play

    • useCharacterRequest

      public void useCharacterRequest(int[] color, int characterPosition)
      Sends to the server the request to use the Character card at the specified position. It's used to play this of this Character: JESTER, MINSTREL
      Parameters:
      color - the array of the color of the student to move. If the Character is the JESTER, the first 3 colors are the students present at the entrance, the others are the students on the Character card. If the Character is the MINSTREL, the first 2 colors are the students present at the entrance, the other 2 are students in the dining room
      characterPosition - the position of the Character card to play

    • setGame

      public void setGame(boolean newGame, int lobby)
      Sends to the server the request to start a new game or to add a new client to the lobby
      Parameters:
      newGame - true if there is the request to start a new game
      lobby - the number of the lobby

    • setPlayerInfo

      public void setPlayerInfo(String nickname)
      Sends to the server the information about the nickname chosen by one player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the player

    • initialSetUp

      public void initialSetUp(int numPlayer, boolean expert)
      Sends to the server the information about the number of player and the mode of this game and
      Parameters:
      numPlayer - the number of player of this game
      expert - true if the game will be played in expert mode

    • setPlayerColor

      public void setPlayerColor(TowerColor color)
      Sends to the server the information about the color of the tower chosen by a client
      Parameters:
      color - the color chosen by the player

    • refreshLobbies

      public void refreshLobbies()
      Sends to the server the request to print the list of the available lobbies present
